protocol.name: P-GSE58620-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Robust Multichip Analysis (RMA) algorithm using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE58620-2
protocol.text: for HS groups, the treatment was 37℃ for 30min

protocol.name: P-GSE58620-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana) plants of ecotype Col-0 were used for all experiments. Sterilized seeds were grown in Murashige & Skoog solid medium within glass plates. After a 72 h vernalization at 4℃ in dark condition, plats were transferred to the growth camber (ambient temperature of 23℃, relative humidity of approximately 70%, and a photoperiod of 16 h light approximately 100 μmol m-2s-1 alternating with 8 h darkness).

protocol.name: P-GSE58620-4
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE58620-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE58620-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE58620-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned by using Affymetrix® GeneChip Command Console (AGCC) which installed in GeneChip® Scanner 3000 7G.
